data.text:
I have been in Egypt many times but this was the worsest visit. I know the standards of this price of hotels and 
this one is not worth of it.  The room was very old and not very clean. When u walk thru the hotel "shopping area" then all the windows are covered by old bed sheets and full on dust. Food is not very good as well. Amphoras theater show was in russian language. When we checked in, then reception guy said that there is free bus to Naama Bay every evening at 8pm but you have to book it advace..witch is ok, but when we wanted to book to next day then he said to us thast not avalible.  Water slides were open only 10-12 and 15-17. Only positive thing was good weather.. I would not recomend this hotel.
data.title: First and last time in this hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Thank you for your precious time, it is very important for us to know how our guests spend their holidays with us.
According your comments, we didn‚Äôt receive such a comment from you or any other guests during this period, but we will take action with the relevant departments to avoid this in future
owner_response.author: shaimaa ali

data.text: Amphoras Agua Hotel is a very wonderful hotel. Everything in it is wonderful. The people who work there are wonderful and speak wonderfully. The animation is very beautiful. We had fun with Mando today and it was a beautiful day. We danced with him and did the strongest gym.
data.title: Hello

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Happy to greet you from Amphoras Aqua, Sharm El Sheikh resort, we are glad that you enjoyed your holiday with us. Be sure that we are constantly working to meet the needs of our guests.
owner_response.author: shaimaa ali

data.text: Amphoras Aqua is a smaller and compact hotel that I really liked. Although the beach is about 500 m away on foot, there is an alternative for lazy sunbathers in the comfortable pool area. I think there is also bus to the beach, but it was strange to travel such a short distance by bus. I was also satisfied with the area of the hotel, it was clean and had enough green plants to please my eye. The location of my room was excellent, and the view from the room did not open to the neighbors, but thank you very much for the room with a beautiful view - I could see a bit of the sea! ü§ó Talking about the food ... I didn't find anything extraordinary, but at the same time there was always something to eat. Although I think that if food is very important and someone is looking for a food experience, Amphoras Aqua is not the best choice. With its beach, this hotel is great for coral and snorkeling lovers, and it has also an easy taxi ride to both Naama Bay and the Old Market for evening activities. I will definitely visit this hotel again ... if I can get the room with the same view! üòÅ
data.title: Nice hotel üè® üëå

data.text:
It was a good experience. Hotel staff were very kind and nice! Animators were very polite and fun! 
I just only didn‚Äôt satisfied with the food. 
Hotel was clean and organized. 
Thank you for everything!

data.text: Mesha, the animation artist at the hotel, brings enchanting characters to life through his incredible skills. His animations add a touch of magic to our surroundings, captivating guests with whimsical storytelling. His talent elevates the guest experience, making the hotel a truly animated destination.
data.title: With a stroke of creativity, mesha transforms our hotel into an animated wonderland, weaving imagination into every fram

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Thank you for taking the time to share your impressions and add your review about the hotel. 
We are glad to know that the animation team was able to leave a positive impression. 
We will be happy to welcome you back to Amphoras Aqua Hotel and look forward to seeing you and your family in the near future.
owner_response.author: shaimaa ali
